field_recall_reason_description: Due to user error message resulting in ventilator entering into an ambient state
title: Hamilton Medical AG Issues Recall (Correction) of all HAMILTON-G5 Ventilators (PN 159001 that contains the software versions < 2.60) Due to User Error Message “Panel Connection Lost”
description: Hamilton Medical AG is updating all HAMILTON-G5 Ventilators [(PN 159001 that contains the software versions ≤ 2.60) with a newly developed software version 2.80, to reduce the probability of the user message “Panel connection lost” and ventilator entering an ambient state. The user error message is
